ResourceHeader.Description: The LASP Interactive Solar Irradiance Data center (LISIRD) at U. Colorado supports several solar irradiance data sets from such spacecraft as SORCE, TIMED, UARS and SME. Both total irradiance and spectrally resolved irradiance data sets are supported. Also available are reference spectra, composite time series, and model results. Overall wavelength coverage spans 1 to 24,000 A.
